content: DPI Visual Analyzer “A new RFID solution for your safety at work” By Intellisystem Technologies The continuous increase in accidents at work is doing an intensification of efforts and especially investment in technological research, aimed at identifying viable solutions to prevent dangerous situations. In this video it is presented a solution based on technologically advanced RFID last generation systems that, if applied in large and medium-sized shipyards or on oil platforms, will allow lowering the number of accidents in the workplace at the same time favoring a greater empowerment of workers in the use of personal protective equipment (PPE).
title: DPI Visual Analyzer “A new RFID solution for your safety at work” By Intellisystem Technologies
